scripts.build: tsc && pkg ./dist/index.js --targets latest-macos-arm64 --output dist/nodecar && pnpm rename-binary
scripts.build:mac-aarch64: tsc && pkg ./dist/index.js --targets latest-macos-arm64 --output dist/nodecar && pnpm rename-binary
scripts.build:mac-x86_64: tsc && pkg ./dist/index.js --targets latest-macos-x64 --output dist/nodecar && pnpm rename-binary
scripts.build:linux-x64: tsc && pkg ./dist/index.js --targets latest-linux-x64 --output dist/nodecar && pnpm rename-binary
scripts.build:linux-arm64: tsc && pkg ./dist/index.js --targets latest-linux-arm64 --output dist/nodecar && pnpm rename-binary
scripts.build:win-x64: tsc && pkg ./dist/index.js --targets latest-win-x64 --output dist/nodecar && pnpm rename-binary
scripts.build:win-arm64: tsc && pkg ./dist/index.js --targets latest-win-arm64 --output dist/nodecar && pnpm rename-binary
